doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 45, Time Warner New York City [Air date: 11/20/1997]
Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 45, Time Warner New York City [Air date: 11/20/1997]
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra (HX), "The one. The only. The original."
1. Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: CDC National Aids Hotline, "When I Grow Up"
COMMERCIAL: National Foundation for Infectious Diseases, C. Everett Koop, PSA for Hepatitis A

2. Interview: Verna Eggleston, Executive Director of the Hetrick-Martin Institute, and Tom Huser, President of the Board of the Hetrick-Martin Institute, discuss the controversy surrounding the Institute's potential creation of a group home for lesbian and gay youth.
COMMERCIAL: Elizabeth Taylor for AmFAR, "Don't make it five thousand and one"
4. "Here's to Our Health: Lesbian and Gay Health Concerns": Timm Sharbaugh discusses the importance of Vitamin B12
6. Nora Burns discusses nightlife and entertainment-related events that relate to the LGBT community.
7. Footage from CSPAN of Ellen DeGeneres speaking at the Human Rights Campaign National Dinner.
